text: Hi, Oda Sensei! Earlier I used Haki of the Supreme King on my one-year-old sister, and she laughed. Why?
Because your sister is the one who has the true disposition of a king.
Odacchiii!! In Chapter 977, after Nami gives Jimbei that big hug, I spotted Sanji in the corner biting his handkerchief out of sheer frustration!!
--A purehearted middle schooler who wanted to meet Odacchi on Tanabata

Wow, that's incredible! How did you spot that? It's cut off on the side of the panel, so you really have to use your imagination to figure it out. Yes, Sanji is doing this in the background. Good job!
ルフィのギア4があるならギア5もありますか？！
*If Luffy has Gear 4, will there be Gear 5?!

I liked the power in your writing, so I printed it directly in the book. Hmm, I wonder if there will be Gear Five! I mean, the enemy Luffy has to beat now is supposedly the strongest in the world. And if you look around in the world today, there's 4G and 5G everywhere. I assume G stands for "Gear," right?
In Chapter 978, Ulti is talking like an "ever so fancy" lady, and Page One says, "Is this another one of your weird
IS THIS ANOTHER ONE OF YOUR WEIRD TRENDS? STOP TALKING LIKE THAT, IT'S EMBARRASSING.
HE JUST CALLED THE TOBI ROPPO ARROGANT PUNKS! WHY, THE NERVE OF THAT BEASTLY MAN!!
trends?" So what was her trend before that?!
Ah, yes. Before that, she talked even more old-fashioned. She would say, "Pay-Pay, pity thy poor wretched sister!" But currently, she seems to have settled on talking like a fancy lady.
